description: Implemented runtime user-specific configuration for a multi-tenant Angular 20+ app by fetching init.json files from AWS S3, enabling tailored user experiences without redeployment. Migrated B2B SaaS financial form to modern signal-based architecture with shared state management, improving scalability and maintainability. Integrated custom dataLayer implementations for enhanced GA4/GTM tracking.

Developed modern media B2C SaaS Angular (17-19+) with TypeScript, reducing code complexity by 40% and doubling UI update speed. Designed cache invalidation rules and TTL policies, reducing API latency and increasing conversion by 15%. Migrated Laravel backend to NestJS microservices with serverless Lambda, modular architecture, and caching, cutting API response times by 30%.

Re-engineered legacy system during migration to B2B SaaS SPA. Improved SEO by adding SSR and optimising landing pages. Used Matomo analytics to identify high-exit points and improve Time to Interact (TTI), reducing uncanny valley effects and increasing conversion rate by 15%.

Delivered B2C SaaS Angular (15-17+) KYC workflow with advanced identity verification, increasing completion rates by 35%. Redesigned flow to include partial KYC, reducing cognitive load and increasing engagement. Implemented Sentry error logging and automated UX audits with Lighthouse.

Redesigned responsive crypto wallet using Angular (14-15+) and NodeJS AWS Lambda, improving task completion rates by 50% with UX and accessibility enhancements. Implemented Cypress e2e automation and mutation tests. Integrated MFA and Stripe gateways for improved security.

Created B2C SaaS Angular (11-12+) with Mobile First approach, increasing conversion by 15%. Redesigned product customisation flow, increasing flow conversion by 25%. Leveraged AWS ECS for Dockerised testing environments.
Built B2C SaaS Angular 11+ eCommerce app with @ngrx and microservices, improving UX and engagement. Consolidated app and dependencies into unified QA container with AWS CloudFormation.

Led team of 7 on B2B SaaS @ngrx Angular 8+ project using SOLID and Modular Monolith pattern. Enhanced financial crime screening and compliance management. Embedded security into development lifecycle.

Executed performance improvement plan using Angular 8+ and TypeScript. Migrated monolith to micro-frontends with Pub/Sub event-driven architecture. Led team of 8 and implemented layered Angular architecture with @ngrx and Facade pattern.

Led team of 7 to develop real-time incident management system with offline capabilities using AngularJS, TypeScript, NW.js, and CouchDB. Reduced operational costs and improved emergency response time by 45%.
